choices: On Kiera Bed While She Sleeps
1.content:
Jack is a 13 year old boy who lives in a orphanage we’re the nobody actually cares about him. Jack is a massive fan of Kiera Knightly, she stars in movies like Pride And Prejudice, Pirates Of The Caribbean And Atonement.

You think she is very talented but you also have the biggest crush on her since you first seen her films. You have watched everyone on of her movies (including the bad ones).

One night you see a shooting star and you are actually desperate enough to wish On it. You wish you can be with Kiera and you can care how just so he can be close you her.

The next morning you wake up in a strange environment, you look around at you environment and you realise that you 1cm fall.

Where are you.
1.title: Getting Shrunk

info.brief_description: You are shrunk and Kiera Knightley is a beautiful giantess
info.description:
You are Jack, a 13 year old boy who has a massive crush on Oscar Nominated Actress Kiera Knightley (https://www.imdb.com/name/nm0461136/mediaviewer/rm168620544). One day you wish you could be with her anyway possible. And you did, just not the way you were hoping for.

RULES:
1). Keep If Unaware (If Found He Is A Bug Or Toy To Her)
2). She Can Have A Fictional Boyfriend (Just No Solo)
3). Anything Sexual Can Happen, Go Crazy
4). Try To Describe What She Is Wearing (Or Use Images To Describe Her)
5). No Deaths
